title: Piriform CCleaner Technician Edition v4.10.4570 Multilingual Inc
description:
Piriform CCleaner Technician Edition v4.10.4570 Multilingual




CCleaner Business EditionCCleaner Technician Edition is the easiest, fastest and most thorough means to clean a PC and instantly improve your customer's experience. CCleaner Technician Edition is the first step in PC repair and maintenance.



Install and remove remotely or via USB
Unlimited use per technician
Priority CCleaner Tech Support
Re-Use of Piriform, CCleaner technical and promotional materials
First notification of updates, beta programs and special offers
Generate Revenue through Piriform Affiliate Program
Products and Services Newsletter



Features

World-famous PC cleaning tool
Highly customizable engine, tailored for your needs
Monthly cleaning updates
Reduce support calls and increase customer satisfaction



System Requirements

CCleaner Technician Edition is fully tested and certified on:
Workstations: Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista and XP.
Servers: Windows 2012, 2008 RC2, 2008, and 2003.






Installation:


1) Unrar and install

2) The program will attempt to phone home when registered so you must either add the following line to your hosts file or block the connection with a firewall.
The Technician Edition does not seem to attempt to phone home again after being registered however to be safe a permanent block is recommended.

3) You can block the app in your
C:WindowsSystem32driversetchosts file:
127.0.0.1 license.piriform.com

4) If you register any program with a Bundle serial, it will create a registry entry that will register any of the other programs the next time you run them.
